author: mass
msg: Make changes neccessary for CA certificate loading which is compatible
This includes documentation and setup changes, the user-affecting one
being the format of the ssl-authorities-file option in the 'servers'
config has changed. It is now meant to be a semicolon-separated list
of individual PEM-encoded CA certificates, where before it was a
single file holding all of the PEM-encoded certificates.
SSL_CONFIG_OPTION_SSL_AUTHORITY_FILES, and change the value to
(semicolon-delimited PEM files), and update the commented
examples to use the new name and include multiple certificates.
(svn_ra_dav__open): loop across files in ssl-authority-files config

author: mass
msg: Remove remaining traces of ssl-client-key-file and ssl-client-cert-type.

author: mass
msg: Remove support for .PEM-formatted client certificates. Support for
client PEM certificates is removed in Neon 0.24, and support for
multiple certificate file formats is not neccessary.
support PEM certificates (optional private key location, and
config, add note that the client certificate is in PKCS12 format.
client_ssl_prompt_first_cred): remove code for choosing and
(svn_auth_first_credentials): remove code relating to PEM support

author: kfogel
msg: Fix issue #1214: Rework the authentication provider prompting API, so
that GUIs can be supported as naturally as command lines.  Much thanks
to Ben Collins-Sussman for explaining the auth system to me... twice.
Define the new credential-constructing prompt callback types:
(get_creds): Removed, unfactored into distinct functions below.
client_ssl_pw_prompt_first_cred): Rewrite to use the new prompt
callbacks.  In some cases, code was moved from here to the
prompters, since they're now responsible for constructing creds.
client_ssl_pw_file_first_credentials): Pass the variable, not the
Change provider constructors to use the new prompt callbacks, and
prompt callback types in svn_auth.h above.
type svn_auth_simple_prompt_func_t.  Also, fix doc string.
type svn_auth_username_prompt_func_t.  Also, fix doc string, and
callback type svn_client_ssl_server_prompt_func_t.  Also, fix doc
string, and reformat prototype for 80 columns.
callback type svn_client_ssl_client_prompt_func_t.  Also, fix doc
string, and reformat prototype for 80 columns.
type svn_auth_ssl_pw_prompt_func_t.  Also, fix doc string.
Adjust the command-line client to implement the new prompt callbacks
and pass them to the provider constructors:
(svn_cl__prompt_user): Simplify prototype and redocument, since we
no longer use this for auth prompting.
(prompt): New internal static function, was svn_cl__prompt_user.
(svn_cl__prompt_user): Rewrite as a simple wrapper around above.
svn_cl__auth_ssl_pw_prompt): New functions.  In some cases, code
was taken from provider functions in libsvn_client/auth.c,
because cred construction logic is in the prompters now.
(main): Don't set a prompt function and baton in the client ctx.
We're constructing auth providers here, and nothing in
